synopsis.text:
Maa-kun's life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a large, expressionless bear who carries a drum and drumstick. This bear, known as Mr. Super Bear, surprisingly saves Maa-kun from a bank robbery. Intriguingly, Mr. Super Bear is also seen entertaining children alongside a clown, leaving Maa-kun and others questioning his true identity.

In this anime, Kuma, a seemingly ordinary blue plush bear, leads a double life. While typically friendly and serene, Kuma transforms into Super Kuma-san, a formidable protector, when faced with evil. In a thrilling twist, a vengeful wooden doll with a sinister agenda threatens the peace of the town. Can Super Kuma-san put a stop to the doll's malevolent plans and restore tranquility before it's too late? Join Maa-kun and the town's children as they navigate this exciting adventure.
